SEARCH
Package supermarket.domain.algorithm

Class SimulatedAnnealingAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
supermarket.domain.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm
supermarket.domain.algorithm.SimulatedAnnealingAlgorithm
public class SimulatedAnnealingAlgorithm extends AbstractAlgorithm
SimulatedAnnealing is an implementation of the Simulated Annealing optimization algorithm. This class is used to find an optimal arrangement of elements that minimizes the cost function based on the input distance matrix. The algorithm uses a stochastic process to escape local optima by occasionally accepting less optimal solutions based on a probability that decreases over time.

    • calculateDistribution

      public int[] calculateDistribution()
      Executes the Simulated Annealing algorithm to find an optimal distribution of elements. The process begins with a random solution and iteratively attempts to find better solutions.
      Specified by:
      calculateDistribution in class AbstractAlgorithm
      Returns:
      An int array representing the optimal distribution of elements found by the algorithm.
